ProductInfo.Features:
9.4 Inch IPS screen (1280 x 800px) , all degree viewing angle, bring you exceptional new display experience. Aluminum shell, Ultra slim, G+ G Capacitive Touch Screen, LCD, 10 point multi touch
Rockchip RK3188, Cortex A9 quad core, 1.8GHz; GPU: Mali 400 MP4
Latest android 4.1 Jelly Bean OS, compatible with tons of apps from google play store.
2GB DDR3 + 16GB(System space about 2.5GB) Support TF card up to 32GB(TF card Not includes)
Dual camera, front is 2.0 megapixels, back is 5.0 mega AF WIFI, HDMI TV out,1080P, Bluetooth Gravity Sensor
ProductInfo.Name: PIPO M8 Pro - 9.4 inch IPS Screen Ultra thin Quad Core Cortex A9 RK3188 1.8GHz Tablet PC Android 4.1 2G RAM Bluetooth Dual Camera Black
